message.content:
I need to identify the total income arising from ordinary activities and its constituent line items.

Looking at the income statement:

1. "Total Revenue" is 6836701.10, which represents the total income from ordinary activities.
2. The main constituent of this revenue is "Main Business Revenue" with a value of 6836701.10.

Since "Main Business Revenue" equals "Total Revenue", it appears to be the only sub-item contributing to the total income.

Therefore:
- The total income value is 6836701.10
- The sub-item (Main Business Revenue) value is also 6836701.10

```json
{"solution": {'value': '6836701.10', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '6836701.10'}}}
```
